headline: Dominion Energy Schedules Third-Quarter 2025 Earnings Call
summary: RICHMOND, Va., October 02, 2025--Dominion Energy (NYSE: D) will host its third-quarter 2025 earnings call at 11 a.m. ET on Friday, Oct. 31, 2025. Management will discuss matters of interest to financial and other stakeholders including recent financial results.

headline: Infrastructure Upgrades to Drive FirstEnergy's Future Performance
summary: FE's $28B grid modernization plan and growing data center demand highlight its growth prospects despite regulatory risks.

headline: NextEra Energy Gains From Investment and Renewable Focus
summary: NEE's strong investment plan to strengthen renewable power generation and acquisitions to expand overall operations is likely to continue boosting its performance.
